Pivot Point Data and Analytics-AI practice (D2A) is seeking a full-time Senior Director of Business Development. The digital operating model has disrupted nearly every industry. This has been fueled by the digitization of the consumer experience. This journey has begun in healthcare and life sciences. D2A partners with their clients to leverage novel practices and tools to accelerate their data innovation journey by leveraging analytics-AI to thrive in this business landscape. This position is part of the D2A senior leadership team responsible for growing this business by shaping the practice and product-service offerings, and creating deep, long-term engagement with client partners.Description:Participate as a senior leader of the D2A practice. Create and Develop client relationships through networking, sales, and marketing calls. Increase market share in existing clients and maximize new business development opportunities throughout the nation, achieving targets for revenue, gross margin, and sales growth. Exceed customer expectations and contribute to a high-level of customer satisfaction. Competitive salary with full benefits (medical, dental, vision, HSA, 401k, PTO, and )Reports to Vice President, Business Development with dotted line to Vice President, D2A practice. Responsibilities:Develop new and existing client relationships. Account executive for key client relationships. Work with practice leadership to develop and launch product-service offerings. Develop and implement strategy to grow the business by promoting adoption of product-service offerings. Assist in the creation of proposals, presentations, and RFP responsesExceed all activity standards for prospecting calls, client visits, and gross sales marginStrong desire for sales with a proven track record of successesAdditional:Ability to learn new skills quickly, excel at multi-tasking, and have excellent communication and written skills. Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines. Ability to travel to client and prospect locations across the nationInitiate, drive, and enthusiasm. Excellent organizational and follow up skills, the ability to prioritize work assignments. Knowledgeable in every step of the sales cycle: Prospect, Contact, Negotiation, Close, and Follow up. Commitment to a positive workplace culture andRequirements:Business development experience within the healthcare industry is required. Experience in healthcare analytics-AI consulting from a sales background. Understanding of how analytics-AI is leveraged in healthcare to drive value. Experience working with executive leadership in the business, clinical and technology (CEO, CFO, CMO, COO, CIO, CDAO, etc.). Background and knowledge of healthcare analytics-AI tools and technology – agile, data warehousing, big data, BI tools, data science and AI. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to implement solutionsPrior clinical experience a BIG plus. Compensation:SalariedUncapped commissionQuarterly contest bonusAnnual trip contest prizeProfessional association member reimbursementVaco, LLC ("we," "our," or "Vaco") respects your privacy and is committed to providing a transparent notice of our Notice at Collection and Privacy Policy for California Residents. This Notice and Privacy Policy for California Residents applies solely to those who reside in the State of California ("consumers" or "you"). For additional details, click here.California residents may also access Vaco's HR Notice at Collection for California Applicants and Employees.Vaco is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race (including but not limited to traits historically associated with race such as hair texture and hair style), color, sex (includes pregnancy or related conditions), religion or creed, national origin, citizenship, age, disability, status as a veteran, union membership, ethnicity, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, marital status, political affiliation, or any other protected characteristics as required by federal, state or local law.
